short_summary: Organizational Design and Classification consultants One (1) Senior and One (1) Intermediate
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) ForTASK BASED PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TSPS)This requirement is for Immigration Refuge Board of Canada (IRB) Solicitation Date: 2022-08-10 Anticipated Start Date: Once evaluations have been completed Solicitation: Selective Number of Contracts: 1 Requirement DetailsThis requirement is only open to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TTSPS who qualified under Tier 1 (= $0 - $3.75m) for the following categories: 1.2 Organizational Design and Classification consultants One (1) Senior and One (1) Intermediate",
